ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, as of right now i can get my CHA to 170 with the buff and jewellery, but i sacrifice 15 or 20 INT. without all the extra jewellery, it s 120something
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, as of right now i can get my CHA to 170 with the buff and jewellery,
but i sacrifice 15 or 20 INT. without all the extra jewellery, it's
120something with only the buff. if i am solo, i go with INT. if i am with
a group, more often i go with CHA because all i do is crowd control and i
can med during fights.

At 01:57 PM 11/18/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Fozzle Brainbender <fozzleb@...>
>
>I gave up on the INT to 200 quest, and am now doing
>the CHA to 200 quest instead =)
>Last night I charmed a Cyclops for what seemed to be
>well over 5 minutes. I finally went invisible after he
>stuck around for two fights, and let my group beat him
>up. with 165 Charisma I notice a definate boost in
>Charm....good thing I play care bear =)
>
>
